text: ehet oba givisum kara gat mema samānayan tabā namadinnangen kavurun (tamangē givisumehi) kisivak obaṭa aḍupāḍuvak nokarada, obaṭa viruddhava kisivekuṭat udav nokarada siṭinnōda, ovunṭa ovungē givisumehi ehi niyamita vāraya dakvā (kisima aḍupāḍuvak nokara) pūraṇaya kara tabanu. niyata vaśayenma allāh bhaya bhaktikayinva priya karannēya
